channel.title: Lone Survivor
channel.description:
The best thing since Saving Private Ryan. It's really sad, it's inspiring and is an eye opener. I really believe Hollywood has finally produced a well-done actual event inspired movie. But honestly, the gold medal doesn't go out to Hollywood, it goes out to the American soldiers and Pashtun village who died and fought in Operation Red Wings. Truly inspiring.
You will be asking questions after watching the movie so go here when you're finished http://www.historyvshollywood.com/reelfaces/lone-survivor.php

item.title: Lone Survivor
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I felt like they could of done a better job.

This is not the best thing since Saving Private Ryan so don’t even go there.

Read full topic

It seemed like really realistic fights.
It’s just actual story vs the movie that annoyed.
